Posts.Content: jrk7382 wrote: I had serous nipple discharge (one duct, one breast), that has shown up off and on for a few weeks.  Upon exam at the dr, they felt lumps in both breasts and sent me for a mammogram.  After the mammo they did an u/s and said I had lots of cysts, follow up only if I continued to have problems or was worried.  I was fine.  THEN I got a call from the Dr with the offical report that showed dilated ducts in the breast with the discharge and to get an MRI.  Here's the thing.  I don't have insurance, BCBS dropped me because of pre-existing conditions.  Is an MRI really necessary or should I just wait?  Chances are it's nothing.  I'm 30, had a hyst 4 ears ago (uterus and cervix only).   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: What would you do next? jrk7382 JaLoLa

Posts.Content: Dec 14, 2012 11:29AM - edited Dec 14, 2012 11:29AM by jrk7382 I just hate to have any further testing if it's not really necessary.  I sadly just dropped 7k on TMJ treatment so this couldn't have come at a worse time!
